ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon garlic salt, or to taste
1 tablespoon mayonnaise, or more to taste
1 (1.7 ounce) container nori fumi furikake (seaweed and sesame rice seasoning)
¼ cup oil for frying, or as needed

cookingTips: Mix mayonnaise and honey before brushing on salmon for even coating
Apply furikake seasoning right before cooking so it adheres well
Don't overcook salmon - cook until it flakes easily, about 4-5 minutes per side
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand what furikake is and its umami flavor profile. Explain that the mayo-honey mixture serves as a binder for the seasoning and suggest internal temperature guidance for perfectly cooked salmon.
